item.title: Philip Hubbard
item.description: There is new work out today on the #neuroscience of the #Drosophila visual system: a new computational framework to quantify the anatomy of visual neurons, a new classification of 53K neurons into 727 types, and a matching collection of split-GAL4 fly lines.
